titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the Whatcom County Shoreline Inventory 1970-1979
titlestmt.author: Finding aid prepared by CPNWS staff

publicationstmt.publisher: Western Washington University, Center for Pacific Northwest Studies

profiledesc.creation: Finding aid encoded by Rozlind Koester 2012
profiledesc.descrules: Finding aid based on DACS ( Describing Archives: A Content Standard).

did.abstract: The collection includes maps and survey notes relating to an inventory of shorelines and lakeshores in Whatcom County, Washington.

scopecontent.p: The collection includes maps and survey notes relating to an inventory of shorelines and lakeshores in Whatcom County, Washington.

accessrestrict.p: The collection is open to the public.

prefercite.p: Whatcom County Shoreline Inventory, Center for Pacific Northwest Studies, Western Libraries Archives & Special Collections, Western Washington University, Bellingham WA 98225-9123.

processinfo.head: About Harmful Language and Content
processinfo.p: To learn more about problematic content in our collections, collection description and teaching tools (including how to provide feedback or request dialogue on this topic), see the following Statement About Potentially Harmful Language and Content

relatedmaterial.p: The Charles Dotson papers and the George and Lois Garlick papers also contain material related to shorelines in Whatcom County, Washington. Both are available at the Center for Pacific Northwest Studies.

controlaccess.p: This collection is indexed under the following headings in the online catalog. Researchers desiring materials about related topics, persons, or places should search the catalog using these headings.
